title: Font ID: Century Stencil font used in ID Magazine
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106042144im_/http:/typophile.com/files/s1_6463.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106042144im_/http:/typophile.com/files/s2_5352.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106042144im_/http:/typophile.com/files/s3_4400.png)

Looks like Coranto is out and some version of Century is in text (would like to know that too).

There’s also these nifty Century stencil fonts.

Are they exclusive?  
Who’s the designer?

Mikey :-)
author: SuperUltraFabulous

comments.content: could be [ncsbc](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106042144/http:/www.geoffroytobe.com/) by Geoffroy Tobé. A previous thread is [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106042144/http:/typophile.com/node/56527).

Akira that’s it!!

I’m gonna drop Geoffroy to see if it’s for sale or if it’s exclusive.

Thanks... Mikey

Did Geoffroy get back to you???  
I need a licence for this font
He said it will be up for license at some point... I would contact him.

Was this made from scratch or derived from an existing font?

hhp
